snippet: A survey of hiring by private companies showed that they added 162,000 workers last month, while activity in service industries like real estate and health care rose.
abstract: ADP National Employment Report shows private employers added 162,000 jobs in September, down from 189,000 in August; Institute for Supply Management's purchasing managers index rises to 55.1 from 53.7.
lead_paragraph: A survey of hiring by private companies showed that they added 162,000 workers last month, while activity in service industries like real estate and health care rose.

headline.main: Jobs and Service Sector Data Point to Modest U.S. Growth
headline.print_headline: Jobs and Service Sector Data Point to Modest U.S. Growth
